A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without a doubt\, this was one of the most disappointing movies I have ever seen. Don't believe the defenders. Everything that was set up in the Force Awakens is thrown out the window for the sake of subverting expectations. Luke is made to be a joke. The Canto Bight sequence was complete garbage and Rey is a legitimate Mary Sue. 1 year on and I am still mad about how poorly this movie turned out.
